recipe.title: Cranberry Pecan Cheese Ball Recipe by Tasty

ingredients.ingredient: 1 ½ cups ; shredded sharp cheddar cheese ; (150 g)
⅓ cup ; chopped pecan, plus more for coating ; (40 g)
¼ cup ; sliced green onion ; (50 g)

steps.step: Mix softened cream cheese, sharp cheddar, dried cranberries, pecans, and green onions until well-combined.
Form into a ball, then roll in chopped pecans to coat.
Serve with crackers of your choice.

steps_updated.steps_updated: Mix softened cream cheese, sharp cheddar, dried cranberries, pecans, and green onions until well-combined.
Form into a ball, then roll in chopped pecans to coat.
Serve with crackers of your choice.
